name: Authors Posts Widget
author: Fahad Mahmood

sections.description:
• Author: Fahad Mahmood

  • Project URI: http://androidbubble.com/blog/wordpress/widgets/authors-posts-widget

  • License: GPL 3. See License below for copyright jots and tittles.

This is a free WordPress widget to display authors posts in your sidebars. You can display collapsable authors posts in sidebars. You can set number of posts to show/hide titles and excerpts. Preview of authors profile picture in post is also available.

Detailed description.

Important!

Visit my blog and suggest good features which you wana see in this plugin.

License

This WordPress Widget is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 2 of the License, or any later version. This free software is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this software. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html.
sections.installation:
To use Authors Posts Widget, you will need:
* an installed and configured copy of [WordPress][]

(version 3.0 or later).

* FTP, SFTP or shell access to your web host
sections.changelog:
1.4.0

  • Version updated for WordPress. [05/06/2024]

1.3.9

  • Version updated for WordPress. [02/05/2023]

1.3.8

  • Assets updated.

1.3.7

  • Tags updated. [Thanks to Abu Usman]

1.3.6

  • UI updated.

1.3.5

  • Banner, icon and screenshots updated. [Thanks to Abu Usman]

1.3.4

  • Bullets updated and heading tag as well. [Thanks to seanbperiod]

1.3.3

1.3.2

  • Three languages added, Spanish, French & German. [Thanks to Abu Usman]

1.3.1

  • Sanitized input and fixed direct file access issues.

1.3.0

  • Notices and warnings handled and excerpt display feature added.

1.2.0

  • Refined file structure.

1.1

  • Number of posts to show is provided.

short_description: Authors posts widget with blogger style.

upgrade_notice.1.3.4: Bullets updated and heading tag as well.
upgrade_notice.1.3.1: Sanitized input and fixed direct file access issues.
upgrade_notice.1.3.0: Notices and warnings handled and excerpt display feature added.
upgrade_notice.1.1: Number of posts to show is provided.
upgrade_notice.Upgrades: To upgrade an existing installation of Authors Posts Widget to the most recent release: 1. Download the Authors Posts Widget installation package and extract the files on your computer. 2. Upload the new PHP files to wp-content/plugins/authors-posts-widget, overwriting any existing Authors Posts Widget files that are there. 3. Log in to your WordPress administrative interface immediately in order to see whether there are any further tasks that you need to perform to complete the upgrade. 4. Enjoy your newer and hotter installation of Authors Posts Widget

screenshots.caption: Number of posts to show as per author
